comments.text:
This is similar to bug 666753, but this problem seems to be newer (also I think we never got to the root cause in bug 666753).
A minimal listener in a frame script that access aWebProgress.DOMWindow makes the tests running in content/base/test/chrome/ fail with "Wrong URL Loaded!" error, and then it crashes the test suite.

The current test where this will occur is: content/base/test/chrome/test_bug467123.xul, but the problem is not on that test. It passes when running it standalone, and if I remove it from the tests folder then the same error occurs on the next test.

See tbpl here: https://tbpl.mozilla.org/?tree=Try&rev=c2c5dcd8a4b7. I'll attach the minimal test case and a full log in case the tbpl try run disappears
